SkilledTradesBC policies and bylaws set out the requirements that guide B.C.’s trades training and apprenticeship system. They include clear definitions and listings of approved programs, as well as key standards, expectations and criteria applicable to apprentices, employers, sponsors, and training institutions.

Legislation

The following legislation outlines requirements related to B.C.’s skilled trades training system. 

  * [Skilled Trades BC Act ](https://www.bclaws.gov.bc.ca/civix/document/id/complete/statreg/22004)

  * [Skilled Trades BC Regulation](https://www.bclaws.gov.bc.ca/civix/document/id/oic/oic_cur/0650_2022/search/CIVIX_DOCUMENT_ROOT_STEM:\(%22Skilled%20Trades%20Certification%22\)%20AND%20CIVIX_DOCUMENT_ANCESTORS:oic_cur?1#hit1)

  * [Minister's Skilled Trades BC Regulation](https://www.bclaws.gov.bc.ca/civix/document/id/mo/mo/m0362_2022)




##  Bylaws, Policies, and Factsheets

[Academic Misconduct Policy](https://skilledtradesbc.ca/sites/default/files/2025-03/E.03.2022%20v.1%20-%20Academic%20Misconduct%20Policy%20%28EXTERNAL%29%20-%20FINAL.pdf)

This policy sets out SkilledTradesBC's expectations regarding academic integrity and academic misconduct, including consequences associated with engaging in academic misconduct.

[Administration of Certification Exams Policy](https://skilledtradesbc.ca/sites/default/files/2025-09/Administration%20of%20Certification%20Exams%20Policy%20%28EXTERNAL%29%20-%20FINAL%20%28July%2029%2C%202025%29.pdf)

This policy outlines SkilledTradesBC's requirements for the administration of Certification Exams.

[Administration of Standard Level Exams Policy](https://skilledtradesbc.ca/sites/default/files/2025-10/Administration%20of%20Standard%20Level%20Exams%20Policy%20%28EXTERNAL%29%20-%20FINAL%20%28July%2029%2C%202025%29%281%29.pdf)

This policy outlines SkilledTradesBC's requirements for the administration of Standard Level Exams.

[Apprentice Supervision and Sign-Off Authority Policy](https://skilledtradesbc.ca/sites/default/files/2023-12/E.01.2023%20-%20Apprentice%20Supervision%20and%20Sign-off%20Authority%20Policy%20%28External%29%20Final.pdf)

This policy outlines who can act as supervision and sign-off authority for all trades.

[Apprenticeship Agreement Policy](https://skilledtradesbc.ca/sites/default/files/2023-12/E.02.2023%20-%20Apprenticeship%20Agreement%20Policy%20%28External%29%20Final.pdf)

This policy outlines requirements for entering into an apprenticeship agreement.

[Credit for Prior Training and Experience Policy](https://skilledtradesbc.ca/sites/default/files/2024-09/E.04.2024%20-%20Credit%20for%20Prior%20Experience%20Policy%20%28EXTERNAL%29.pdf)

The policy outlines requirements for recognizing and applying prior experience and/or credit(s) earned towards an apprenticeship program.

[Exam Accommodations Policy](https://skilledtradesbc.ca/sites/default/files/2025-02/E.04.2022%20v.1%20-%20Exam%20Accommodations%20Policy%20%28EXTERNAL%29%20-%20Final.pdf)

This policy outlines SkilledTradesBC's requirements for individuals requesting [accommodations](/exam-accommodations) (exam writing supports) to complete their SkilledTradesBC exams.

[Privacy Management Policy](https://skilledtradesbc.ca/sites/default/files/2024-11/E.02.2022%20v1%20-%20Privacy%20Management%20Policy%20%28EXTERNAL%29%20-%20Final.pdf)

This policy sets out how SkilledTradesBC manages personal information.

[Request for Review Policy](https://skilledtradesbc.ca/sites/default/files/2024-12/E.05.2022%20v.1%20-%20Request%20for%20Review%20Policy%20%28EXTERNAL%29%20-%20Final%20%281%29.pdf)

This policy outlines the requirements and processes for requesting a review or appeal to a decision or order made by SkilledTradesBC.

[Trade Qualifier Policy](https://skilledtradesbc.ca/sites/default/files/2024-04/E.03.2023%20v1%20Trade%20Qualifier%20Policy%20%28EXTERNAL%29%20-%20Final.pdf)

This policy outlines requirements for Trades Qualifier Applicants.

[Training Provider Designation Policy](https://skilledtradesbc.ca/sites/default/files/2025-02/E.01.2022%20v.1%20-%20Training%20Provider%20Designation%20Policy%20%28EXTERNAL%29%20-%20FINAL.pdf)

This policy outlines the criteria for approving training providers other than public post-secondary institutions. 

## 

Factsheets

[Persons Authorized to Work in STC Trades Certification Trades Factsheet](https://skilledtradesbc.ca/sites/default/files/2023-12/Persons%20Authorized%20to%20Work%20in%20STC%20Trades%20Factsheet%20%28Final%29.pdf)

This factsheet outlines who qualifies to work in a Skilled Trades Certification trade and who is exempt.

[Reviews and Appeals Factsheet](/media/1565/download)

This factsheet is of interest to individuals who are the subject of a decision or order made by SkilledTradesBC and who wish to request a review of that decision or order. The factsheet and [policy](/media/2289) outline requirements and processes for requesting a review.

[Scope of Work Factsheet](https://skilledtradesbc.ca/sites/default/files/2023-12/Scope%20of%20Work%20Factsheet%20%28Final%29.pdf)

This factsheet outlines what scope of work is, who it applies to and the scope of work for each Skilled Trades Certification trade.

Forms
